name: The Other World of Coraline (BlueStacks)
description:
Hello, ga-LOO-boo-shka! it's my first game! This time: Coraline and the Secret Door or The Other World of Coraline! it took me soooo long to download it because I've had to download it from apk and bluestacks

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Coraline discovered a parallel world where everything is prettier and more fun. What she doesn't know is that it's an evil witch's trap to get her under her control. Help her defeat the witch before it's too late in this fun point and click game.

LAIKA studios made the og movie.

RUN ON BLUESTACKS, ANYTHING ELSE COULD RESULT IN CRASHING.
